description: I have tried Mixxx in the past, of course only from RPM never from source (my bad I guess) and had "Mixed" feeling for the app. But, since the 2.0 upgrade in Fedora 25. it works much more fluently. I have been using it for private reunions and it has worked flawlessly.
I recommend you install it.

Has all the features Traktor has (AFAIC). 
The interface is highly customizable, hints are quite helpful and comprehensible, even for a noob.

Also, Mixxx can map channels from different hardware out-of-the box. as opposed to similar apps on Win, which require virtualization software, such as ASIO4ALL.
I have been using virtual decks since "PC dj RED" .The only thing i had to do with Mixxx was to configure the output. Excellent for Linux. Top marks.
summary: PERFECT for DJ's and MUSIC LOVERS

description: Perfecto para iniciar

I am so impressed by the way this app has developed.

I am Linux user and this app has performed beyond expectations.

My Numark Mixtrack Edge Controller is well supported and the app is stable. 

By no means am I a Pro user but the sampling FX and mix accuracy seriously rivals Traktor, VDJ and Serato.

All this for free!

Keep up the good work!!

Nice app highly recommended.
please update soon next version which is included sound leveling and equalizer.
When shutdown the computer all setting are not saved this is huge problem.

I started out 20 years ago with PCDJ red and tried many others. Usually some had good features but not everything and others wanted money to get good functionality.

Along comes Mixxx that does it all and for free.......I wish I had this back in the day. This almost makes me want to get back in the business again.

Great........
summary: Totally the best DJ software around!!

description: A great app to have on Linux, it made me forget about my windows partition
this is good software for DJ
Im so glad theres a free alternative and really really good stable and awesome dj app! HANDS DOWN TO ALL MIXXX DEV GROUP. LOVE YA GUYS.
Awesome Job. enjoying the many adjust i can make.

379/5000
The app is good overall, intuitive user interface, but lacks sync times on snap, vynil, and beat detection. Skins should be friendlier and the handling of the audio cards are blocked with Realtek drivers. It has several areas of opportunity for improvement compared to Traktor Scratch 3 (developed in Qt). Three stars.
_________________
La aplicación es buena en general, interfaz de usuario intuitiva, pero le falta tiempos de sincronización en snap, vynil y detección de beats. Pieles debería de ser más amigables y el manejo de las tarjetas de audio se bloquean con controladores de Realtek. Tiene varias áreas de oportunidad para mejorar en comparación con Traktor Scratch 3 (desarrollado en Qt). Tres estrellas.
for some reason mixxx processes my cpu too high when i boot it at first. rebooting mixxx seeems to work most times
I'm a linux user and i love this app because it better than the other dj/mixer app i've seen before, everything is where its surppossed to be.
summary: wow! love it great app guyz.

description:
vive la france
cet appli c'est de la merde mis dans du cassoulet avec de la pisse et du vomi comme sauce
2 fists out of 2

Been using Mixxx for a few years and its never let me down, i made a custom mapping for 2 of my controllers and both work great. Best free option for djing on linux i think, works great on windows too.

The product was released with a flaw in a key feature- autodj simply does not work as it skips songs at random. Furthermore, for a 24/7 station, leaving it on autodj for more than 24 hours (say between live shows) causes Mixxx to crash. AVOID UNTIL THEY FIX IT!
summary: Was the best until 2.3- key feature DOES NOT WORK

description: The team have turned things around with this update and many of the flaws from 2.3 have been dealt with, meaning it is once again the best DJ app available for home studios. 2.3.2 is impending with final fixes, so I'll be back with hopefully a 5* review then.
summary: 2.3.1 gets the product back on track!

description: Great possibilities, excelent UI

This was the best free dj app out there, but the new version (2.3.2) does not scale properly on your screen 1920 x 1080.
It is horably oversised and that makes it unusable.
The solution posted on their site does not work.
Ubuntu 20.4
Very good application
summary: Awesome, works with my old Hercules controller too

description:
I'm using a hector instinct control and a Numark pro fx and both works perfect.
Thanks so much.
summary: Thanks so much for making this application. It just works

description: I am using it for ages now, perfect DJ app.
summary: great app now finally in flatpak

description: Really mature and full featured software. Great!

Sync is not working, doesn't seem to support any DJ controller. Supported controllers are outdated and out of sale. UI is terrible. Transitioning is not smooth. Custom mapping a controller is way to hard. Hitting the headphone button just powers the volume up two times instead of making the sound also come throw the headphones.
I can't hear the music with or without the headphones.
best dj software in linux

Its true. I am so happy and grateful this app exists. Its so simple to use and works out of the box with minimal config. I am using DVS with vinyl and I even scratch with it. No latency and gives hours of pleasure. Stable AF and I litterally want for nothing. Thanks is not enough, if i were richer I'd donate £9999999 without a second thought.
Pioneer/Native Instruments/Serato etc... This is a better alternative in terms of ease of use and just working out of the box.

Ich habe vorher mit Sam Broadcaster gearbeitet (also Windows) Ich bin total begeistert von MIXXX
Auch der Auto Dj funktioniert recht gut für eine Radio Station! Was mir allerdings fehlt... Im rechten mausmenü bei Playlisten usw... "Dublikate entfernen"
Ansonsten 5 Sterne für dieses gute Programm

eine sehr gute Software und nicht nur füre Dj's geeignet auch für den Amateur Broadcast sehr zu empfehlen. Es fehlen nur die individuelle Tasturbelegung für Ubuntu und die Möglichkeit im Auto DJ für den Live Brodacast exakte Überblenden mittels vorgegebener Parameter einzustellenund ein auto Stop für Moderationen zu setzen per Mausklick.
summary: Einige Kleinigkleiten fehlen wäre schö, wenn diese umsetzbar wären

description: never had any issues.

Ich habe nach langer Zeit wieder Mixxx installiert, aber bei mir ist scheinbar die Oberfläche defekt, da doese nicht mehr aussieht, wie sie sollte und ich komme in den ursprünglichen Einstellungen auch nicht mehr rein und der Skin kann auch nicht geändert werden und irgendwie wird einiges doppelt, aber falsch dargestellt. Mixxx ist eigentlich gut, aber ich weiß leider nicht, warum die Oberfläche unter Ubuntu zerschossen ist.
Habe kürzlich von Win 10 auf Ubuntu umgestellt und einen Ersatz für Virtual DJ gesucht. Mit Mixxx habe ich genau diese Alternative gefunden. Super Programm!
summary: Läuft auf meinem Surface Pro 4 problemlos. Super Ersatz für Virtual DJ

description: das Einlesen einer Bibliothek, oder auch von Verzeichnissen dauert ewig. Offensichtlich beginnt der Import auch ein paar Mal immer wieder von vorne. Nicht nachvollziehbar. Außerdem kann man während dieser Zeit nichts anderes mit dem Programm machen. Es stürzt ab. Bei der Konkurrenz ist das alles im Handumdrehen erledigt.

ich benutze mixxx schon seit jahren im club bei meine hochzeit und geburtstagen gigs und hat mich nie im stich gelassen einzige was geändert werden könnte ist das such leiste auch bei verschiedende ordners sowie auch bei computer und schnellzugriff wie es mal am anfang war eventuell wave form vertikal wie änlich bei serato oder virtual dj ansonsten klasse muss man sagen
Soy DJ profesional con mas de 18 años de experiencia a MixxxDJ lo considero uno de los dos mejores software DJ de que existen.

La aplicación es, en su versión estable 2.2.1, ligera, amigable, intuitiva (si has usado software similar) y funciona muy bien. Lo malo es que una vez abierta no permite el uso de los recursos mutimedia en otras aplicaciones.
La aplicacion esta magnifica pero le hace falta algo,,,Actualizarla para cuatro pistas de sonido y samples,, quedaria una belleza de aplicacion
